request.description: After signup, a verification code will be sent to the user's email, and an `access_token` . The verification code and the `access_token` will be required in the `POST /auth/verifyemail` endpoint

response.name: Success
Success

request.description:
The `verification_code` will be in the verification email sent to the user after the `POST /auth/signup` request

NOTE

The verification code has an expiry, if it expires the user will have to request for another verification code by using the endpoint `GET /auth/verificationemail`
After initiating a Forgot password request, a `password_reset_code` will be sent to the users email, this will be required to complete the Password reset process in `PATCH /auth/resetpassword`

response.name: Success

request.description: The `password_reset_code` should be gotten from the mail sent to the user.
